DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Method Code PCORnet CDM Discharge Vital Status Source Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data._The Patient-reported category can include reporting by patients family or guardian.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Method Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per  model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Discharge Vital Status Source Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The Patient-reported category can include reporting by patients family or guardian.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that vital sign data came directly from a device in a healthcare facility.

Concepts.definition: An indication that vital sign data came directly from a device in a healthcare facility.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Changed to new EVS concept specific to this term as the existing concept was a duplicate with another PV - Patient device direct deed - DW 04-30-2019

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that vital sign data came from an individual or record within a healthcare delivery setting.

Concepts.definition: An indication that vital sign data came from an individual or record within a healthcare delivery setting.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that vital sign data came from a device in direct contact with the patient.

Concepts.definition: An indication that vital sign data came from a device in direct contact with the patient.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that the patient provides information about their vital signs, status, or subjective feelings. Some systems also consider information reported by the patient's family or guardian as patient-reported.

Concepts.definition: An indication that the patient provides information about their vital signs, status, or subjective feelings. Some systems also consider information reported by the patient's family or guardian as patient-reported.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model

DataElement.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and PCORNet value set for CDM.
